title: So much like Futura, but for that R and Q
content:
I've tried all the type ID sites and haven't found this font. Can anyone help? Thanks!

http://www.squarespace.com/templates/?q=aviator

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526014024im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6033)
author: pjkoren

comments.content: i believe that's Julius Sans One, available through Google Fonts.
Bingo! Thank you very much. -Pat Koren
